Getter/Setter for the cell_centers-slot

Source: R/getters_setters.R, R/agent.R
cell_centers.Rd

Works for agent-class.

cell_centers(object)

cell_centers(object) <- value

# S4 method for class 'agent'
cell_centers(object)

# S4 method for class 'agent'
cell_centers(object) <- value

Arguments

object

An instance of the agent-class.

value

Value with which to replace the original value of the cell_centers slot.

See also

agent-class

Examples

# Initialize agent
my_agent <- agent(center = c(0, 0), 
                  radius = 0.25, 
                  cell_centers = matrix(1, nrow = 33, ncol = 2))

# Access the cell centers for the agent
cell_centers(my_agent)
#>       [,1] [,2]
#>  [1,]    1    1
#>  [2,]    1    1
#>  [3,]    1    1
#>  [4,]    1    1
#>  [5,]    1    1
#>  [6,]    1    1
#>  [7,]    1    1
#>  [8,]    1    1
#>  [9,]    1    1
#> [10,]    1    1
#> [11,]    1    1
#> [12,]    1    1
#> [13,]    1    1
#> [14,]    1    1
#> [15,]    1    1
#> [16,]    1    1
#> [17,]    1    1
#> [18,]    1    1
#> [19,]    1    1
#> [20,]    1    1
#> [21,]    1    1
#> [22,]    1    1
#> [23,]    1    1
#> [24,]    1    1
#> [25,]    1    1
#> [26,]    1    1
#> [27,]    1    1
#> [28,]    1    1
#> [29,]    1    1
#> [30,]    1    1
#> [31,]    1    1
#> [32,]    1    1
#> [33,]    1    1

# Change the cell centers for the agent
cell_centers(my_agent) <- compute_centers(my_agent)
cell_centers(my_agent)
#>              [,1]         [,2]
